Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-2SN1 (XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: skin, fine-spined frog,Hylarana spinulosa, Hainan, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against S.aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC 200 uM),  E. faecium 091299 (IS) (MIC 100 uM),  E.faecalis 981 (IS) (MIC 200 uM), N. asteroides 201118 (IS) (MIC 25 uM), P.aeruginosa (CGMCC 1.50) (MIC >400 uM), K.Pneumoniae 08040724 (IS) (MIC >400 uM), E.cloacae CGMCC 1.57 (MIC 400 uM), E.coli ATCC 25922 (MIC >400 uM), P. faecalis X29 (IS) (MIC 12.5 uM), C.glabrata 090902 (IS) (MIC 400 uM), C.albicans ATCC10231 (MIC>400 uM). IS= Isolated strain.Toxicity: HC50 ~100 uM, low hemo.lytic. Updated 10/2020; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Yang X, Hu Y, Xu S, Hu Y, Meng H, Guo C, Liu Y, Liu J, Yu Z, Wang H.2013
Literature Information.Title: Identification of multiple antimicrobial peptides from the skin of fine-spined frog, Hylarana spinulosa (Ranidae).
